description:
In this new story, the tranquility of the forest is threatened when the spring, which is the source of life for the entire environment, mysteriously begins to dry up. This endangers all the creatures that depend on its water.

Throughout the story, themes of leadership, the legacy of ancestors, and the importance of teamwork to overcome obstacles and maintain balance in nature are explored.
name: Bambi: A Life in the Woods
intro: This visual novel follows Bambi, now an adult and respected leader in the forest, alongside his longtime friends and new children, Geno and Gurr.
